product_name: Tretorn Skerry Vinter Shiny Rain Boots - Women's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Great for getting through cold, rainy days, the Tretorn Skerry Vinter Shiny rain boots deliver superb waterproof protection and brightly colored style. Mid-calf height, natural-rubber uppers form a tough waterproof barrier; natural rubber construction means they're PVC-free. Soft polyester microfleece linings wick away moisture to regulate foot temperature and deliver insulation in cold weather. Nylon loop at top of boots gives you leverage to slip feet comfortably inside and tuck in your pants. Rubber midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support. Tretorn Skerry Vinter Shiny rain boots feature gum rubber outsoles for great traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Great for getting through cold, rainy days, the Tretorn Skerry Vinter Shiny rain boots deliver superb waterproof protection and brightly colored style.
